GlobalVariables.StudyDescription: Phase II Randomized Trial of ViralBlock vs Placebo

MetaDataVersion.Name: Study ViralBlock COVID Study Data Definitions

ItemRef.MethodOID: MT.Concatenate STUDYID and SUBJID using catx('-', STUDYID, SUBJID)
MT.Derived from TRTSDT using put(TRTSDT, yymmdd10.)
MT.Derived from TRTENDT using put(TRTENDT, yymmdd10.)
MT.Calculated using intnx('year', TRTSDT, -AGE, 's') and formatted with put(..., yymmdd10.)
MT.Derived from TRTSDT using put(TRTSDT, yymmdd10.)
MT.Derived from TRTENDT using put(TRTENDT, yymmdd10.)
MT.Derived from ARM, ACTARM, and SCRFL based on predefined logic
MT.Derived from ARM, ACTARM, and SCRFL; renamed for XPT length limit

ItemGroupDef.Name: AE
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per adverse event per subject

ItemGroupDef.Name: VS
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per vital sign measurement per time point per visit per subject

ItemRef.MethodOID: MT.Derived from USUBJID_OLD using catx("-", STUDYID, SUBJID)
MT.Parsed from VSORRES using input(..., best.)
MT.Derived from VSDTC_num using put(..., yymmdd10.)

ItemGroupDef.Name: SUPPAE
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per IDVAR, IDVARVAL, and QNAM value per subject

ItemRef.MethodOID: MT.Derived using catx("-", STUDYID, SUBJID) from AE
MT.Converted from AESEQ using put(AESEQ, best.)
